recipe.title: Salami Tortellini Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; cheese tortellini, cooked ; (75 g)
½ cup ; fresh basil, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: Add the pesto to the bottom of a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar.
Add the tortellini, salami, tomato, basil, and Parmesan.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the pesto to the bottom of a 16-ounce (480 ml) mason jar.
Add the tortellini, salami, tomato, basil, and Parmesan.
Store in the refrigerator for 2-3 days.
When ready to eat, shake well to combine.
